title: Tickets for today
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on ballpark app
AND user is logged into an account with today tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User views teams on tickets on today tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is able to view Away team @ Home team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User views display time on tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is able to see game time using venue local time
User is able to see location of venue
User is able to view game description if available
Module should expand in height to accommodate additional fields or larger font settings
